title: 2007년 Harris 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Harris. 판결일: 2007-01-09. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Conroy Harris
**판결일**: 2007-01-09
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 36 A.D.3d 629
- 825 N.Y.S.2d 921

## 판결문 요약


Appeal by the defendant from an amended judgment of the County Court, Westchester County (Dickerson, J), rendered July 16, 2003, convicting him of rape in the third degree, upon his plea of guilty, and imposing sentence.
Ordered that the amended judgment is affirmed.
We have reviewed the record and agree with the defendant’s assigned counsel that there are no nonfrivolous issues which could be raised on appeal. Counsel’s application for leave to withdraw as counsel is granted (see Anders v California, 386 US 738 [1967]; People v Paige, 54 AD2d 631 [1976]; cf. People v Gonzalez, 47 NY2d 606 [1979]). Ritter, J.P., Goldstein, Florio and Covello, JJ., concur.
...
